sentences.en: ‘I’ll be back by 1.00.’ ‘ Promise ?’ ‘Yes! Don’t worry.’
sentences.cn: “我1点钟前会回来。”“你保证？”“是的！别担心。”

sentences.en: "You promise?" — "All right, I promise."
sentences.cn: “你保证？”——“好的，我保证。”

sentences.en: a promise to broaden access to higher education
sentences.cn: 拓宽高等教育渠道的承诺

sentences.en: a shop where Tom and I are on a promise with the girls serving there.
sentences.cn: 一家我和汤姆与女服务员有默契的商店。

sentences.en: Claire had made me promise to tell her the truth.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔要我保证把真相告诉她。

sentences.en: He had promised that the rich and privileged would no longer get preferential treatment.
sentences.cn: 他已承诺富人和特权阶层将不会再得到优待。

sentences.en: He reappeared two hours later, as promised.
sentences.cn: 就像他保证过的，他两小时后再次露面。

sentences.en: I would say it'salmost time to hold him to that promise.
sentences.cn: 我认为已经差不多是时候让他兑现那个承诺了。

sentences.en: I'll call you back, I promise.
sentences.cn: 我会给你回电话的，我保证。

sentences.en: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.cn: 如果做出了承诺，就应该遵守。

sentences.en: interactive technology titillates, promises the earth but delivers nothing.
sentences.cn: 交互式技术令人兴奋，吹得响，实效少。

sentences.en: It would have been dishonourable of her not to keep her promise.
sentences.cn: 她要是不履行诺言就不光彩了。

sentences.en: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.cn: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

sentences.en: oh, I'm not joking, I promise you.
sentences.cn: 哦，我不是在开玩笑，我向你保证。

sentences.en: President Kaunda fulfilled his promise of announcing a date for the referendum.
sentences.cn: 卡翁达总统兑现了他的承诺，宣布了全民公决的日期。

sentences.en: Promise me you will not waste your time.
sentences.cn: 向我承诺你不会浪费你的时间。

sentences.en: Promise me you'll take very special care of yourself.
sentences.cn: 答应我，你会特别小心照顾好自己。

sentences.en: She resolved that, if Mimi forgot this promise, she would remind her.
sentences.cn: 她决定，如果米米忘记了这个承诺，她就提醒她。

sentences.en: She whoops with delight at a promise of money.
sentences.cn: 她因为有可能获得一笔钱而高兴得大叫。

sentences.en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentences.en: The post office has promised to resume first class mail delivery to the area on Friday.
sentences.cn: 邮局已承诺在星期五恢复该地区第一类邮件的递送。

sentences.en: There will be no mudslinging, they promise.
sentences.cn: 他们许诺不会再有诽谤了。

sentences.en: They were encouraged by a promise from Cardinal Winning.
sentences.cn: 红衣主教温宁的许诺使他们受到鼓舞。

sentences.en: This will all come out in the wash—I promise you.
sentences.cn: 一切终会真相大白的——我向你保证。

sentences.en: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.
sentences.cn: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。

words.tran_cn: 约定的；允诺的；约定支付的
充满希望地；大有可为地
许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式）
允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（尤指用以加强安慰、鼓励或威胁的口气）我（向你）保证
[圣经]上帝允许给亚伯拉罕的地方；乐土；福地；希望之乡（等于Promised Land）
(非正式)（人）被确切保证某事的（尤指性关系）
(非正式)（表示说话者怀疑某人宣称的意图）诺言复诺言

trans.tran_cn: 诺言，获得成功的迹象，吉兆
trans.tran_en: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen

trans.tran_cn: 允诺， 保证； 预兆， 预示
trans.tran_en: to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen
If you promise that you will do something, you say to someone that you will definitely do it
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen
